identity.name: UrbanCab
identity.primary_color_rationale: Electric Indigo for trust and digital efficiency, mixed with Amber for taxi heritage visibility.

headings.description: Designed for transport and readability. Use for all H1-H4.

body.description: Clean, geometric sans for high-density data readability.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-3
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300 shadow-sm transition-all rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-3
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 transition-colors rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 shadow-[0_2px_10px_-2px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] p-6 hover:shadow-[0_8px_30px_-4px_rgba(0,0,0,0.08)] transition-shadow duration-300
cards.dashboard_widget: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200/60 p-5 h-full flex flex-col justify-between

inputs.base: bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 focus:bg-white focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/10 transition-all rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-slate-900 placeholder:text-slate-400

navigation.marketing_nav: fixed top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 w-[90%] max-w-5xl bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 shadow-sm rounded-full px-6 py-3 z-50 flex items-center justify-between
navigation.dashboard_sidebar: fixed left-0 top-0 h-full w-64 bg-slate-900 text-white p-6 z-40 border-r border-slate-800

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL_DEPENDENCIES: npm install lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge date-fns react-day-picker
THEME_SETUP: Ensure Tailwind is configured with the custom colors defined in 'design_system.colors'.
LAYOUT_STRATEGY: Use the 'marketing_nav' style for the landing page. It should be floating and glassmorphic.
DASHBOARD_STRATEGY: Create a distinct layout for Admin/Dealer (Sidebar based) vs Customer (Top-nav based).
BOOKING_FLOW: The booking wizard should be a multi-step process with clear progress indicators. Use 'AnimatePresence' from framer-motion for smooth step transitions.
MAP_INTEGRATION: For the MVP, use the 'map_abstract' image as a background for the route selection step if a real map API is not available. Overlay route lines using SVG if needed.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all form inputs have associated labels and focus states are visible (ring-2 ring-primary).
TESTING: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Use generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside cards.
Never use pure black (#000000) - use Slate-900 (#0F172A).
